name: Summon the Living Tide
entries: You can cast {@spell conjure animals} without using a spell slot. When you do, you can add the following options at the summoning list of the spell:

items: One swarm of tiny beasts of CR 1
Two swarms of tiny beasts of CR ½
Four swarms of tiny beasts of CR ¼

entries: Once you do so, you can't cast it  in this way again until you finish a long rest.
